A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a very fun movie\, but it wanted to be an even longer movie and the cutting shows. There's a sub plot that doesn't quite work and could have been fixed. The tension between it being a movie for kids and a movie for adults was clearly a strain on the writers\, as was the tension between the new generation and the older generation of characters. They only have so much screen time. Maybe this all should be happening on a small screen.
